events.message: I received the wrong product in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle this refund request and follow up accordingly.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can process the refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo showing the product I got instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the info. We will process a full refund to your original payment method and send you instructions to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate the refund and will return the product as instructed.
The refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your case.
Since we have not received any further concerns, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting support.
